content: <@583892532644151312> do you see any difficulties or potential issues in implementing `V2` in a backwards compatible way to `V1`? author: m.kalinin
content: <@449019668296892420> would you mind to share you thoughts about no necessity in introduction any `getCaps` method in the issue? (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/issues/321)

author: yperbasis
content: I'm fine with either strictly requiring V2 methods to be used for Shanghai blocks only or with accepting V2 methods for pre-Shanghai blocks; we just have to pick one option and clarify that in the spec. But to my mind V1 methods should definitely be rejected for Shanghai blocks.

author: m.kalinin
content: I also think that both approaches, `getCaps` as a method and fallback on error, may perfectly co-exist. CL may rely on whatever it want to
